sources.title: Life Is Beautiful
sources.description:
Late 70s. A totalitarian regime has been established in one of the Mediterranean countries. Former military pilot Antonio works as a taxi driver and is not going to get involved in politics, but his beloved Maria is an active member of the underground. Antonio is drawn into the confrontation. And when everyone is arrested, the underground people decide that it was he who betrayed them...

Year of production: 1979

Director: Chukhrai Grigory
Screenwriters: Chukhrai Grigory, Caminito Augusto
Composer: Armando Travaioli
Cinematographers: Michael Bits, Luigi Kuweiler, Giuseppe Makkari
Production Designers: Sergei Voronkov, Burchiellaro Giantito

Cast: Evgeniy Lebedev, Juozas Budraitis, Adomaitis Regimantas, Nikolai Dupak, Otar Koberidze, Gianini Giancarlo, Muti Ornella, Stefano Media, Enzo Fiermonte
